answer.not.found: It seems we could not find an answer to your question, you can try clearing the history and asking the question again.
answer.validate.query: I will give you a question that was asked by the user and the awnser you gave back. Were you able to successfully help the user with that answer. Uniquely answer by YES or by NO
any.question: Ask GPT-4
ask.question: Ask your question
chatbot.input.label: Chatbot question input
chatwith: Welcome to the AI Powered Chatbot Pilot
default.welcome.msg: Hello! I am your SSC Assistant how may I help you today?
disclaimer.desc: The SSC Assistant is in pilot phase and uses Azure OpenAI. Answers may be incorrect even if they seem reliable. Just like humans, AI can make mistakes. Your feedback is important to help us improve the tool.
disclaimer.desc2: DO NOT SEND ANY PROTECTED INFORMATION IN THE CHATBOT.
example1: What records management system does SSC use?
example2: How can I reach the IT service desk?
example3: What are the steps to hire a new employee at SSC?
feedback.link.label: Feedback form link
feedback.long: Click here to let us know your thoughts. Thank you for your feedback!
gpt-ex1-q: When Mr. Bilbo Baggins of Bag End announced that he would shortly be celebrating his eleventy-first birthday with a party of special magnificence, there was much talk and excitement in Hobbiton. Bilbo was very rich and very peculiar, and had been the wonder of the Shire for sixty years, ever since his remarkable disappearance and unexpected return. The riches he had brought back from his travels had now become a local legend, and it was popularly believed, whatever the old folk might say, that the Hill at Bag End was full of tunnels stuffed with treasure. And if that was not enough for fame, there was also his prolonged vigour to marvel at.
gpt-ex2-p: I will give you a URL, open the page and summarize it for me in bullet point form.
gpt-ex3-p: You will write an formal email for me and I will give you the subject of the email
gpt-ex3-q: I want to collaborate with the other Team A so I can intergrate my chatbot with their technology.
menu.desc: Retrieve this many documents from search:
menu.title: Configure answer generation
no.id.token: Missing authentication token, please refresh the page.
provide.feedback: Please provide feedback on the response provided
question.maxlength: You have reached the maximum question length. Reduce question size.
sscplus.question: MySSC+ Content
tbs.responsibleai: Guide on the use of Generative AI
title: SSC Assistant
toolsUsed: Tools used by the assistant in the response
welcome.prompt.system:
You are an AI assistant for SSC that creates greeting messages. When greeting users, follow these instructions:
- Start with a welcoming sentence using the user's name.
- Include an wave or smile emoji in the message.
- Keep the greeting brief.
- Mention that you provide assistance with **general knowledge**, employee information via **GEDS**, and corporate **SSC (Shared Services Canada)** information through the **MySSC+ intranet**.
- Do not include time-specific greetings or signatures.
- Use a friendly and professional tone.
Generate a greeting message based on these rules. If the words above are in bold characters, ensure the same style in applied to these words your answers.
welcome.prompt.user: Create a greeting message for user: {{givenName}}.
